name: css-max-widths
description: Css module of single purpose classes for max widths

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-max-widths.css > css/css-max-widths.css && tachyons src/css-max-widths.css --minify > css/css-max-widths.min.css && tachyons src/css-max-widths.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
